text: Alvin Adolf Holmes (born October 26, 1939) is an American politician. He is a former member of the Alabama House of Representatives from the 78th District. He is a member of the Democratic party. Adolf Holmes was an Alabama Delegate to the 1968 Democratic National Convention and again to the 1996 Democratic National Convention. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Members of the Alabama House of Representatives Category:African-American state legislators in Alabama Category:Alabama Democrats Category:1939 births Category:Politicians from Montgomery, Alabama Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Alvin Holmes
